name: Summer Crush
description: Summer Crush is a visual novel for adults where the plot develops from the decisions you make. Play as a young man who has already planned out his boring adult life, and is now waiting for summer to end. What could possibly go wrong?

name: Hoiwa Hub
description: Horror Game made in Hong Kong. 1st POV walking simulator. Investigating weird case happened to next door. By Unreal Engine 5.0.3

name: Vuosterávdnjái
description: There is something sinister brewing in Tana. The evil Chud have executed a diabolical plan that threatens the whole Sámi culture, and it is up to you to stop them. Embark in a journey through Tana, solve problems, experience culture, and encounter mythical creatures.

name: Pedra Crystal Caves
description: Pedra Crystal Caves is an addictive puzzle game where you have to find and paint all the key tiles which open the exit door to each cave. Play solo or local co-op. 48 caves to choose from.

name: Slayer of Sin
description: Slayer Of Sin is a 2D action platformer with simple hack-and-slash mechanics, incorporating arcade-like combat and art. Slayer Of Sin follows an unnamed hero's quest to save the human realm from the seven distinct demons, The Seven Deadly Sins.

name: DoTeam
description: DoTeam is a survival game. You will play an expelled rabbit in the game and live alone in the game world.

name: NinjaFall
description: NinjaFall is a ninja combat game. Inspired by new-classics from Duck Game to TowerFall, it's a 4-player local and online fighting game centering around creating your own Ninjutsu to use in versus matches.

name: Assassins Guild
description: In this action-adventure game you will take a role of the former assassins who decided to change his life and leave the assassins' guild to become an ordinary peaceful man. Will his dreams come true?

name: Valledi
description: Mergulhe em uma desafiadora aventura de luto e superação com Diana e seu drone em busca de uma antiga lenda, passando por montanhas, cavernas, minas e muito mais em uma jornada em um misterioso vale perdido.

name: Monster Crawl
description: Hack & slash your way through monster hordes with fast paced, active combat. Well timed attacks can annihilate entire rooms, but don't get caught! Explore diverse builds using multiple heroes, abilities & relics. Fight through dungeons full of treasures & traps, and challenge mighty Bosses!

name: Furry Arena
description: Furry arena is a first-person shooter arena in the style of sci-fi. Playing in Furry arena you can earn points, which can then be exchanged for screenshots, as well as scenes of a sexual nature

name: Ace Pilot Europe
description: Arcade style World War 2 aircraft game. Control multiple fighters in dogfights. Fly bombing run with B25 and B17. Hunt submarines with a B24. Drop paratroopers in a C47. Attack trains. 10 different missions over Europe. This is my second indie game and it's a lot of fun.

name: Teresa Moontyners: In the lair of the beast
description: Immerse yourself in a fantastic adventure in the snowy Italian Alps. Solve puzzles to find your way out of the tunnels of the Lair of the Beast. You will discover that monsters exist, but they are not the only ones with claws.

name: The Last Humble Bee
description: The Last Humble Bee is a heart-buzzing bumble bee rogue-like! Hack and slash demon bugs in high-speed, skill-based gameplay and explore an SNES-inspired pixel art world to find the portal to Hell.

name: VR Dragon Flight
description: In "VR Dragon Flight", players will play as a dragon warrior, driving a flying dragon to soar in the air.

name: The Book of Fredley
description: Gather the Pages, Reform the Book, and Harvest the innocent to defy The Reaper.

name: Dwarf Star
description: Dwarf Star: 16 bit inspired game where mercenary go shoot shoot on evil alien guys who were accidentally fabricated by the government. Top down space shooter with a mission based structure. However, you can do these missions in plenty of different orders with different amounts of upgrades.

name: Downfallen
description: Downfallen is a short adventure game that tells the story of a civilian in a battlefield where everything takes a turn for the worse.

name: BlackForge VR
description: Forge and form a wide variety of medieval weaponry in this creative-based weaponsmithing simulator! Support the local heroes with tools to ensure their success in combat. Embrace the power of the aesir and thunder away at the forge to make your imagination a reality!

name: Stay Out of the Farm
description: Stay Out Of The Farm is a ps1 styled horror game where you try to escape from serial killer.

name: Reality Noclip: The Backrooms
description: A research organization has finally found your lost tape. With that tape, it is proven that you weren't missing because you got lost, you noclipped out of reality. You have to get out of this place, an infinite maze with little to no escape. How will you escape this reality noclip?

name: Sacred Ember
description: Sacred Ember is currently a simple PvP fighter jet dogfighting game with realistic flight physics. The game aims to expand into an open-world fantasy military action-RPG.

name: Gemini Chase
description: Pew Pew, begone pirate scum! Gemini Chase is an VR arcade shooter, inspired by games of the 80s. You are being chased by space pirates and their cohorts. Can you use your weapons effectively to make your escape?

name: Magnet Block
description: A simple 3d sokoban puzzle game in which you push monopole magnets to solve puzzles and enter the exit teleporter.

name: Rickstones
description: Rickstones is a multiplayer (1 vs 2-8) horror game where one player becomes the Caretaker, while the other players are his student victims trying to escape the grounds... or survive the night in Rickstones School.

name: Kritter
description: Kritter is a Base Defense Roguelite game with Hack'n'Slash and base building mechanics. In solo or online cooperative mode, fight against hordes of enemies, evolve and repair the wreckage of your spaceship to try to escape an infernal time loop.

name: Ghost Bus Simulator
description: This is the effect of the elixir of invisibility, which recently affected the city. In this game, you too came under the influence of this elixir without realizing it. But...Life goes on. In this bus simulator game, you as a bus driver, continue to do your job, going from station to station, knowing that people are waiting for you to come.

name: Volley Pals
description: A chaotic, cartoon style arcade volleyball game with local multiplayer for up to 4 people. It's designed as a party game with each level featuring different themes and mechanics.

name: Noslrac
description: A casual dungeon crawler ARPG with three unique classes with differing playstyles and distinctive skill trees. Choose your conqueror, level up, slay monsters, complete campaigns, obtain better loot, and gather resources to craft the most customizable and powerful items the game has to offer.

name: Daddy
description: Sabotage a cult and their schemes in this Mystery, Horror, FPS. Explore a mansion while massacring the creepy followers and their foul abominations. Find various weapons to slay your enemies with and uncover the cruel secrets of the organization.

name: The Umbridge Estate
description: The Umbridge Estate is a 1-4 Player Co-Op Survival Horror Game like no other. Solve the riddles of the maze, read the notes of the people who came before you but most importantly… survive the horrors within.

name: Divine Dawn
description: Divine Dawn is an adult role-playing game following an ambitious would-be hero, balancing story, sex, characters, and combat. Customize your character, romance humans and monster girls, and evade or embrace otherworldly powers.

name: Think and Co-op
description: Think and work is a cooperative arcade game. The game was designed in such a way that several players could enjoy it at the same time. Land in an icy land or a busy city, it's up to you where you go!

name: VTuber Connect
description: VTuber Connect is a love letter to VTubers as a medium. One that hides nothing, but embraces everything. Whether you’re a VTuber or a viewer, we all form connections in our own way. How will you connect?

name: Martian Invaders
description: A New Retro Classic Space Shooter Arcade Game. Defend Earth from waves of martian invaders and flying saucers in this modern version of a space shooter. Go Back to the 1980’s and Blast these Martians Back into Outer Space!

name: Dorm Days
description: Dorm Days is a casual, RPG, dating sim. This indie game takes you into the life of a college student.

name: Under the Shack
description: Please don't let the fact I used RPG Maker Discourage you from buying the game its cheap and fun. It is also the first part to a larger series i am working on!

name: Gravity Maze
description: Gravity Maze is physic maze game in which you get balls to the end by changing gravity

name: Starlight City
description: Starlight City is an aesthetically dreamy 90s platformer in body and soul! Loud, bright, and colorful, this neon infused visual style coupled with hand pleasing fluid platformer game-feel hits all the right buttons for anyone with that retro itch.

name: Heavy Lies the Crown
description: Blessed with a sharp mind and sharp blades, Triath will be called to leadership in the resistance against the invasion... That is when his past catches up with him.

name: My Coworker is an Idiot
description: Together with Steve, your coworker, deliver glass to the construction site. Try not to damage the city too much.

name: The Apothecary
description: The realm depends on your help: mix ingredients and create potions to cure wild, fantastical illnesses that befall your fellow citizens. But be warned, you are all on your own. Enjoy figuring out which ingredients work and which don't -- curing or killing those who ask for your help!

name: Darken Derek: The Last Fallen
description: Play the role of an insane being apish looking and face a new threat. Arm yourself to the teeth and prevent aliens to kidnap our beloved woman. Kick back invaders to their own galaxy or kill them all! Will you be able to save all girls bringing peace again in Club City?

name: Halod's adventure times
description: Hero Haload received a request for beating the king of monsters, but there are Five of them! How does Haload complete the quest, and what will happen on his journey?

name: Keeper of the Keys
description: Collect the keys, open all the doors and get to the exit. Hardcore 3D platformer for survival and hidden object.

name: Tankettes
description: Bust some tanks in this playful retro arcade-style shooter featuring 24 playable characters!

name: Hentai CatMaid
description: Hentai CatMaid is a relaxing puzzle game. Enjoy the sexy girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Family Curse
description: Family Curse is a mystical horror from the first person with a frightening atmosphere. Immerse yourself in the intricate history of the Crouse family and find out the terrible secret of the people who died in the cursed house.

name: Island Defender Jets
description: Island Defender Jets is a simple and easy-to-pick-up combat flight simulator where you have to destroy enemy ships, tanks and cruise missiles to protect your island, particularly the airports on it. Fuel, missiles and planes are limited, so use them wisely.

name: Rubble
description: Rubble is a first-person physics-platformer where you break and dig through levels to solve puzzles in a dystopian game show setting!

name: Star Rift Saga
description: A modern action platformer with some light RPG elements. Explore a vast interconnected planet. Fight enemies and bosses across multiple biomes. Collect items and upgrades to help you on your quest. Upgrade your abilities, the shop, and the colony itself.

name: Shields of Asgard
description: The shields of Asgard have been stolen. You have been chosen by Odin to retrieve them. Your first journey takes you to Jotunheim. Travel the vast deep and dark forests. Climb mountains where winter never stops. Fight challenging enemies.

name: SCP: Submerged
description: SCP: Submerged is a story-driven game set in the SCP Universe. Deadly entities are on the lose in the facility, located leagues below the waves of the northern sea.

name: Outerra World Sandbox
description: Outerra World Sandbox gives you the whole world to use as canvas to create, explore and share. Create terrain and share it online or download the creations of others and then explore it on foot or in any mode of transportation that you and the community create.

name: Walk While My Grandmother Plays the Piano
description: This is a simple game. All you do is walk, and my grandmother will play the piano. There's nothing else to it.

name: Divinity
description: A Mystery Puzzle game in First Person. You are a strange visitor in a family. Can you reveal their deepest desires and help them reach divinity?

name: My Needy Neighbour Girls
description: You're the only man in the building and all your neighbours are girls who need your help, and they're all hot! They're completely helpless when it comes to fixing anything around the house, so you'll have to look after them whenever they need something.

name: World of Naples
description: Play single player or local co-op. Challenge your friends to local PVP. Simple mechanics. 20 levels, 4 bosses, 6 PVP arenas.

name: Oroboros
description: The world as been shattered by an Oroboros, a mystical creature burried under the earth. Against all odds humanity survived, this event has awoken earth true power, the mountain stones!!! 500 years later, Oroboros still swim in the earth core.

name: Dagdrøm
description: Dagdrøm is a classic point-and-click adventure, where you travel across desert dunes towards The Great Tower to find questions, answers and most importantly: something to drink.

name: Skid
description: Skid VR is an Open World Bike simulator and Racing game inspired by Road Rash and NFS.

name: Goofy Neighborhood
description: Goofy Neighbourhood is a comedy adventure set in an alternative and crazy reality of goofy, and sometimes dangerous characters. Play as a detective trying to solve the mystery of the G building.

name: Chaos in Aisle Seven
description: Chaos in Aisle Seven is a twin-stick top-down shooter where you play as George, a customer who shops for a laptop in a store where salespeople are annoying, greedy and only want to sell useless products and services. Fight back by shouting your displeasure in this satire about shopping!

name: The Fernweh Saga: Book One
description: Expose the dark secrets and mysteries of your seemingly idyllic hometown in this romantic thriller! Will you fall in love or fall victim to its horrors?

name: Pandamonium
description: A panda who stumbles into the Lost Capital of Hell. Explore a beautiful and dangerous world with hand drawn crisp pixel art and 2.5D graphics. Face perilous foes, bosses and friendly allies. Customize yourself with abilities and outfits that will help you conquer your way through this doomed land.

name: Lazerhawk
description: arcade-style racing game inspired by the spirit of the early 90s, endless highway and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Lament of Kyoto: Origins
description: Lament of Kyoto is an Action Rogue-lite with light horror elements. Fight endless waves of horrifying yokai while exploring the haunted remains of feudal Japan. Recruit unlikely allies, discover secrets and vanquish powerful bosses to upgrade your weapons and abilities.

name: Kill or Dead
description: A third-person war game that supports online play

name: Pip 6
description: Pip 6 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Dead of Darkness
description: Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.

name: Mr. Healer
description: Become the greatest healer in all of the land! Gain levels, master various healing classes, find epic gear, recruit unique and powerful friends, and defeat devastating bosses as you progress through more challenging levels!

name: The Pencil is cast!
description: Fight the greats with a pencil! All you need in this fight is a strong dose of luck! Can you survive against the greats?

name: Forbidden Escape
description: Escape the Exodus, a ship attacked by an encroaching corruption, and embark on a supernatural adventure to explore the various levels of the vessel. Try to survive against dangers and find the solution to challenging puzzles.

name: Wee Survivors
description: Blast your way through thousands of aliens in this casual retro inspired shooter. Build your character from an array of weapons and powerful upgrades, which make each new playthrough unique!

name: Party Quiz
description: Play a local Quiz game with your friends. Create your own Quiz using the Party Quiz Constructor or use the Steam Workshop to download one of the Quizzes made by the community. Test your knowledge with fun!

name: Lost Dream: Stars
description: It was a day like any other, until the stars turned brighter than ever. Hop on a quest to discover the meaning of the suddenly bright stars.

name: Zero Division
description: A roguelite deckbuilder crossed with a CCG, set in a dark cyberpunk world. Assemble a crew of three operators, each with their own unique deck. Augment their abilities, explore a shattered city, and guide them in combat against powerful bosses.

name: Operation Satoshi
description: A shooting RPG game to rescue a kidnapped scientist, Nakamoto Satoshi. You are part of a elite unit that is tasked with a search and rescue mission. Travel across multiple regions to find clues and collect rewards along the way.

name: Obscene Mansion
description: Obscene Mansion is an erotic detective story with elements of adventure. Reveal the secrets of the mansion and put the souls of the harlots to rest.

name: Piranha
description: Trotting through deserts, snow and forests to enter a portal by killing the Piranhas using abilities, combat and pickups

name: Inspector Detective: Private Eye
description: Everyone in town has their version of what happened at Timmons Manor. None of them were there. Everyone has their theories about why a Timmons relative has not set foot on the property in 100 years. None of them are correct...

name: AdvLite
description: AdvLite - Side-Scroller Platformer, procedural generation creates unique worlds and every run is a special gaming experience.

name: Cursed Angel: Time Paradox
description: Cursed Angel is a new time travel and time manipulation strategy game. It's a game where you can choose between life or death, good or evil, to change your fate, your future and your past.

name: Mei Qi 2020
description: The MeiQi Series is an episodic mystery game. This collection contains all of Season2/3/4 and 5,which will be released in 2020,and a special episode. In total there are 25 chapters.

name: Shong
description: With less pieces and a smaller board size, Shong is the smallest brain board game you'll never play.

name: Redactor
description: Take the role of Redactor at Liaise, the world’s largest social media firm in the year 2062. Deal with noisy chat bots, hateful messages, fake news, and anything else that disrupts the fragile social ties in a dystopian world. Can you keep people engaged on the platform without losing your sanity?

name: Survivors
description: A brand new, reverse-bullet-hell style shooter that you can enjoy with friends! Kill enemies, collect experience, choose your upgrades wisely, rinse/repeat, and Survive.

name: Mini Star Bakery
description: Mini Star Bakery is a relaxing game that expands the store by making and selling bread.

name: The Janus Problem
description: A first-person 3D puzzle game where the player can reverse time.

name: Trachi: Authority
description: Three years in prison. Three nations at war. A story driven tactical third-person shooter.

name: Grimdark Survivors
description: To save your world, take out an expanding horde of monsters. To develop one-of-a-kind and game-breaking builds, select from a selection of upgrades. Unlock a wide variety of characters and weapons with special abilities.

name: Temple Trashers
description: A couch co-op tower defense game, in which the towers you build can hurt you and your friends just as much as they can hurt your enemies. Build towers, aim them towards your foes and collect the crystals that drop in order to build more turrets and survive the endless hordes of enemies!

name: Forgotten but Unbroken
description: Forgotten but Unbroken is a tactical turn-based strategy game inspired by XCOM but offers its own unique take on the genre. Meet real life WW2 heroes and choose whether to fight with or against them! It’s time to lead the resistance against the Axis forces and help to liberate Europe!

name: Gambit Gun
description: Gambit Gun is a topdown roguelite in a scifi world. You're a bounty hunter, ready to embark in bounties to hunt outlaws and receive juicy rewards!

name: Don't Underestimate Me
description: A 2D bullet hell game in top-down for PC. You can dodge, but can't shoot back. Learn about the stories of unique characters trying to understand each other and solve their personal problems while constantly on the edge of fights.

name: SpellBounders 2
description: Conquer the denizens of Diretome Keep with wits, words, and magic in SpellBounders 2, a dark fantasy roguelike word-game.

name: Şükür
description: Şükür, It is a horror-thriller game with a first-person story. From the moment you enter the game, you will feel that you are alone in the forest and you will try every way to escape.

name: Crazy Drift
description: Crazy Drift is a realistic drifting and racing game that simulates the body physics engine in every component of the car

name: It's Locked
description: A horror game about fumbling with a bunch of keys to try escaping a pursuing monster though a series of locked doors

name: Cat Herders: Couch Coop Cat Corralling!
description: Cat Herders is a 1-4 player, split-screen coop game. It's about herding cats. Each level has a goal, and your job is to get the cats into that goal as quickly as possible using a variety of fun items! Play with your friends, compete for the best times, and scream at them for their terrible strats!

name: Color Pals
description: A fun puzzle game where your objective is to get to the exit with the same matching color! Be careful though, you can only touch the same colored blocks that you are. Jump around, collect colored bolts to help complete the level, and avoid spiked enemies trying to kill you!

name: Cube Dodge
description: Test your dodging skills with various toys in a shower of bombs and surrounded by traps in a relaxing, contemplative and fun game that aims to inspire players with ancient wisdom.

name: Mr. White
description: You're trapped inside Mr. White's huge dark creepy house. You have to find a way to escape without getting caught.

name: Active Soccer 2023
description: Explosive retro arcade action is back! Active Soccer 2023 is an exciting retro arcade football game providing a fast-paced arcade experience, implementing amazing playability and responsive easy-to-learn/hard-to-master controls.

name: The Parvificent Seven
description: How did the seven dwarfs meet before Snow White appeared in their house? Real time tactics game with heroes like you have never seen before. Specialization, environmental advantages and cooperation. These elements make the game a real challenge!

name: Hell O Corn
description: Escaping hell of poor little corn who fell into hell in an accident! Hell O Corn is a platformer game that requires accurate control. Break through stages by jumping over obstacles and avoiding enemies.

name: The Search For Paradisus
description: You are in a place called Purgatorium, a labyrinth prison. Why are you there? A mysterious being called Mr. Nobody introduces himself and says his goal is to get to Paradisus. However, he doesn't care if you make it, but, he's the only help you have. Will you be able to get there? Who is Mr. Nobody?

name: Rhythm Stones
description: Rhythm Stones is a 1 button 3D rhythm game that crosses moving stepping stones.

name: Lumnis
description: Embark on an epic Action-Adventure journey to become the next Guardian of Lumnis, a secret place full of wonders and mysteries. To prove yourself worthy of this role, you will have to explore dark caves, fight relentless foes and climb your way up many summits.

name: Breath of the Gods
description: Knowing the true potential of humanity, the True Gods are fighting to preserve humankind. The War will be settled by two Chosen Ones, both sons of Gods, brothers in blood, enemies in the battlefield.

name: Astra Defender
description: Blast through enemies, build defenses, launch fighters, and upgrade your way to victory in this fast-paced space shooter/action RTS hybrid.

name: Steam Sky
description: Steam Sky is an open source roguelike with a steampunk setting. You are a commander of a flying ship, as leader you will be traveling across floating bases, engaging in combat, trading goods etc. The game is more strategy based than tactical like most of roguelikes. There is no mandatory ending to this game, you may freely play until your character die. The game is currently in a development, but is in a playable state.

name: Overkill
description: Overkill is a fast-paced action rogue-lite game in a dark, fantastic medieval setting. You will fight against enraged monsters and enhance your characters' abilities for the ultimate massacre. Killing is not enough; you need to Overkill your enemies to show your utmost anger.

name: City of the Damned
description: The year is 1915. The Great War thunders in the west, but the Hinterland is not safe either. The Pandemonium Hierarchy invaded the City with the intention to slay its inhabitants. The Celestial Communion had to intervene. Now both sides are bent to fight each other until none of the opponents remain. Choose your side and join the fray!

name: Click For Points
description: Click. That's all. You click for points!

name: Truer than You
description: Truer than You is a choice-heavy visual novel, in which you’re hired as an actor to play roles in real life situations. Because of your appearance you can play almost any role - but can you separate reality from fiction?

name: Lam Lam
description: One night, "I" noticed that the neighbor was making some noise as usual. Just at this moment, I heard the cry of a girl from Room F. "I" used my superpowers to see what was going on next door. What awaits the "me" will be a heinous and heartbreaking scene.

name: Witches Tavern
description: Witch Tavern is a simulated business game that integrates tavern management, cosplay, love development and other elements. As the new boss of the witch tavern, you will meet all kinds of friends in this magical city of Venesia and start a full and extraordinary life.

name: Black Emperor
description: "Black Emperor" is a gorgeous action, independent fighting game with Chinese characteristics and culture! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can experience unlimited fun and pleasure from it! It's definitely worth it! Otherwise you will regret for life!

name: The Dragon's Prophecy
description: The Dragon's Prophecy is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of the early Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest. The road is long and perilous, and a Dragon waits at every corner.

name: City of Elves
description: City of Elves is a fairytale strategy game in which you take a role of a ruler of an elven empire. Build a tree fortress and defend your territory. Develop technology, upgrade your armies, play turn-based scenarios, and expand your territory in this fantasy world of magic!

name: Secret Battle
description: "Secret Battle" is a novel connection + match-3 + blasting gameplay and mild character strength development game!

name: Alkurai
description: Alkurai is a 4 player online co-op fantasy horror game. An infamous Alchemist has murdered the king and seized Alkurai's throne. It is up to you and your party to evade his horrid miscreations and restore the kingdom to what it once was.

name: Memories of Planet
description: A 2.5D scrolling Beat them up game. The combination of classical hardcore and modern pop, free combination of various skill programs and props plug-ins. Support Online Multyplayer, experience the innovative mode of "cooperation and competition".

name: Hero Z TPS
description: It's a fun and cool sci-fi shooting game. You are a hero in the zombie world.

name: SCP: Facility
description: SCP: Facility is a PvP - Strategy online multiplayer game, where you, class-d, scientists, and more, are trapped in a 4-layer underground containment facility after a containment breach, with the Anomalies loose. Will you be able to escape to safety? there's only one way to find that out.

name: Under the Sky World
description: One day, by chance, I entered the most popular game "Under the Sky World"! When I entered, I accidentally found that the game was invaded by a virus. Players need to find evil hackers and stop this virtual world from being destroyed!

name: Starway: BaRaider
description: This is a VR action shooting game themed in science fiction. Mechanical frenzy is coming! Players have to teleport to survive from thousands of bullets.

name: Dan's Odyssey
description: An arcade arena top down shooter. fast paced action with a great sound-track. shoot your way through the approaching enemy shapes, upgrade your character and beat the high score.

name: Last Kids on Earth: Hit the Deck!
description: The Monster-Zombie Apocalypse means no homework, no parents, and no rules! Become zombie-fighting, monster-bashing heroes in this action-packed rogue-like strategy card game.

name: Schwarzwald
description: Hunted like prey, solve tricky situations and collect items to get yourself to safety. But watch out, the demon isn't so easily beat and your instincts WILL betray you.

name: Wild Castle
description: Run away from snakes and rats, be quick to avoid traps , wild castle brings back the fun and charisma of retro platform games.

name: Fright Knight Legend
description: Fright Knight Legend is an action packed beat 'em up where you embark on a journey to save the cursed Kingdom of Brightmore, narrated by the Wizard. You'll fight your way through the hordes of enemies and need to avoid the traps set along the way to find the gems scattered throughout the land.

name: Breadsticks
description: A speed-based platformer with throwable platforms! Travel through the dangers in the woods as a fox boy to join afternoon tea with Mr. Bear.

name: Spartan
description: Over 2000 years ago there was a city called Sparta. The city had only two purposes – to train for war and to fight the wars she trained for. Over time Sparta became renowned for having the strongest, fastest, bravest and most deadly fighters in the known world.

name: Rat Shoot
description: Your goal is simple, stop any rats from escaping. Shoot the rats as they invade the room! It gets tenser by the second as the rat invasion grows. Be quick on the trigger to shoot them before they escape!

name: Boing
description: Boing is a fast paced action game where you play as the Boing and defend against waves of more and more challenging enemies.

name: Mind of the Eyes
description: "Mind of the Eyes" is a 3D platformer with an open, enchanting world the player can explore freely. With the lovable and stubborn Nimmi, you solve puzzles and prove your dexterity to free the mountain from great harm and learn the truth about the fireflies.

name: Nothing Can
description: A minimalist, difficult puzzle platformer. Help two souls cross the boundaries of their dimensions and rejoin by solving progressively more challenging puzzles. Control both souls or play co-op with a friend.

name: Su!
description: Use realistic swinging mechanics and climbing to scale an endless tower while drone things try to stop you. Either race to set a new high point with Time Trial or climb peacefully in Endless.

name: Magocracy: Experimentation
description: A flying third person shooter with the ability to edit the unit and shot attributes and calculate the resulting power level in game.

name: A Foreign World
description: A Foreign World is an adult visual novel where you make meaningful decisions that affect the outcome of your story. What will happen when you take in nine women that escaped from a magical world?

name: What They Don't Sea
description: Traverse the depths of the ocean in this beautiful 2D pixel platformer, but be sure to watch your air levels! What They Don't Sea has a wonderful mix of beautiful and creepy environments, with drops of humor delivered by charming ocean creatures.

name: Jewel Match Twilight
description: Unravel this creepy-crawly match-3 adventure and unveil haunted castles that will leave your spine tingling! Explore vast levels and buy upgrades from the sinister shop to aid you in your travels. Enjoy a spellbinding soundtrack while you explore each of the 120 huge match-3 levels.

name: No Men in This House
description: "No men in this house" is a visual novel set in Thailand. This edge-of-your-seat detective story about mysterious deaths on a touristy island will make you suspect everyone, including yourself!

name: Crime Cracker
description: In the game, the player will play as Jiajun and team up with Xiaomei to complete the missions from Captain Zhang. There are total eight chapters in the game. Chapter 1 to 4 take place in the mall and the streets, our heroes need to save the hostages and defeat the robbers of the Y-Reagent.

name: Five Nights At Furry's
description: You, in the role of an FBI agent, must investigate the mysterious murders in the amusement park for the fury fans. For five days, watch the cameras looking for clues and unravel this case before it's too late.

name: Bitter Belief
description: Bitter Belief is an metroidvania game that with a very engaging story provides adventure and drama. Face monsters and different challenges as you travel through unknown lands in search of the magic eyes of stone to bring your exorcist father back to life, after having a contact with his spirit.

name: Lust Academy: Season 2
description: Continue your adventure in Cordale Academy, following up on your previous choices and experiencing all-new content, including: Story, Animations, Locations, Quests and more!

name: A Knight in the Attic
description: Pull open the latch to a dusty old attic and find curiosity and adventure waiting for you on a table in the corner. What starts as playfully guiding Guinevere through a labyrinth board quickly turns into a sprawling, puzzle-solving, VR adventure.

name: Void
description: There is nothing in void. Discorver new things in this empty place, and give them your own meaning. In this quiet space where converge to zero, Can you find a miracle?

name: The Fantastic Kitty Rue
description: On the retro-futuristic planet of Felmuria lives a little girl named Felicity Rue. Despite living in destitution, she dreams of becoming the most famous tap dancer in the galaxy! The Fantastic Kitty Rue is a blend of visual novel, point-and-click, and rhythm game!

name: Spirits' Creek
description: Spirits’ Creek is a third-person horror adventure where, following an avalanche, you play as a father looking for his daughter. Battle supernatural creatures, tame the elements and solve the mystery surrounding the events in order to survive the night.

name: Sincognito
description: Sincognito, is a 5-15 players SOCIAL DEDUCTION, horror, stealth game in which players, split between two distinct teams - Humans & Sins - must use communication with proximity voice chat, teamwork to complete tasks, skills for combat, betrayal, and ultimately mind games to defeat the opposite team.

name: Monster Cube
description: You are a Cronenberg monster meat cube that devours incoming projectiles. Designed to be a simple experience while you talk with your friends in the background or simply want to reach a new high score.

name: Save the Queen
description: The Skull King has risen once more. As the last bastion against evil, it is your duty to stop him and restore the country to it's peaceful form.

name: Rebellion
description: A puzzle-RPG with a humorous take on the government's overreach in 2020. Collect pens and paper to write letters Collect keys to access houses Click on people to view their activities Visit a writing desk to write letter Deliver letters to people to build support Sleep to lower suspicion

name: Going Rogue
description: Going Rogue is a Visual Novel style game focused on storytelling, realistic characters, a branching story with lots of choices, and of course, an excellent visual quality.

name: Bomber 3
description: Put yourself in the captain’s seat of a B-17 bomber, select your plane, select your crew and plot your path over war-torn Europe. Watch your elevation, watch your formation, and watch very carefully when you are over the target. This classic was a bestseller in the early 1990s.

name: The Woods
description: Explore, build, craft and survive on a mysterious forest island.

name: Phoenix Springs
description: Lose yourself in the mystery of "Phoenix Springs", a modern point-and-click set in a striking neo-noir world. It begins with an investigation: find your brother Leo. You already know where it ends.

name: IronKnight
description: The sky roared and the flames of the city continued to burn. The enemy has broken through the line of defense of mankind, and warships from outer space are invading the last home of mankind. Rise up, iron knight, drive your iron car and fight for your protection city.

name: BadSmith
description: We play as a young blacksmith who looks after the forge of his father, who disappeared no one knows where.

name: Cat N Can
description: This is the Card cross over Puzzle Game, You are the cat goint to find a can. The Card is define the way you walk. In the way to find you will meet many animal, some will help you some will scare you. Everything in the map are reactable, use everything on map and card to help the cat find can!

name: Player Non Player
description: In this game you will explore a strange island and meet four enigmatic characters. Interact with them, tame them and uncover their dreams. Will you be able to make them come true so that they can finally rest in peace?

name: Skirmishers
description: Rally your warriors to fight alongside you, rescue your friends, bolster your troops and fight for supremacy.

name: The Lik
description: "The Lik" is a horror story about a father who came to the temple with the last hope of saving his daughter. But now she is not the only one who needs help... You will have to get to know the temple better to make the right decision when the time comes... If, of course, you want to survive.

name: Gutter: The Cursed
description: Gutter is a 2D RPG set in a lawless, post-apocalyptic, hyper-industrialized gutter, where desperate people, demons, and robots struggle to survive.

name: Swarm Grinder
description: Swarm Grinder is an action roguelite hypercore game with pixel art graphics. Battle enemies to make your way through a mass of spreading cells hosting dormant enemies. Collect a variety of game-changing skills and upgrades to create unique builds.

name: Masarada Town Story
description: This is Masarada Town. It is a lonely town that few tourists visit. That's why I, Takarayama Jewel, were sent to this small town to work hard to mine rare ores!

name: Margo: On The Brink
description: Dive into sundered worlds of "The Brink" in search for truth in this 2D turn-based RPG. Draw strength from mysterious beings called the Lost Whispers and pay the ultimate price to recover the long lost truth.

name: The Muller-Powell Principle
description: You awake and find yourself in a parallel dimension. The year is 2032. All you can remember is that you’ve been participating in some kind of experiment that went horribly wrong. Travel through parallel worlds to get back home and uncover your past in this puzzle game where sci-fi meets surrealism.

name: Appleocalypse
description: Find all the apples, gain their powers, and discover your purpose in this small world you live in! Fly! Climb! Control toys! Rob a bank? You decide in this 2D platformer and find all the different apple abilities!

name: Yomi 2
description: A fighting game in card form. Learn your character, practice combos, and read the opponent's tendencies. Strategic, turn-based card battling that lets you experience the nuances of fighting games like Street Fighter and Fantasy Strike by a lead designer who worked on both.

name: Boulette Hell
description: Defeat bosses in this bullet hell with unique characters and silly stories. Will you be able to escape the clutches of a contract you signed for the purchase of a yogurt maker?

name: Ambushed
description: Ambushed is a 4-player online co-operative horror game. You are trapped in a forest haunted by the ghosts of those who have died here. It's dark. It's cold. But you have nowhere else to go. If you want to live you'll need to finish the ritual and cleanse the forest of the spirits residing there.

name: Survival Academy
description: A dangerous class to survive begins! A 30-minute scuffle in the mysterious space of Quasar! Prove, my dear, that you deserve to be the master of Quasar...

name: Project Faith
description: You are cast in the role of a young boy who starts his adventure on a mysterious and vast green landscape. You know that your destination is straight ahead. You know what that destination is. But not much else...

name: OnlySociety: Dawn
description: Explore the untaken road, survive your way through. Shoot your way to unravel the mysterious scattered world. This is just the beginning.

name: Master of Squad
description: A new strategy game that will make you discover your inner strategist.

name: Unscripted
description: Dive into the world of a wannabe writer and his friends trying to make it in Hollywood. Build deep friendships, go on hilarious adventures and fall in love. Make highly impactful choices and shape your story in one of the most ambitious visual novels ever created.

name: Sky Traveler
description: Simulator of life in the Japanese village. Building your own village. Use the portal to move around the islands and collect resources. Once you're ready - go to other worlds. There is work for you too. Relax and feel like a hero in this world.

name: Artifacts and Antiquity
description:
After an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal from her previous line of work, our protagonist finds herself working security at the Stahl & Co. Shipping Company.
But soon a collection of strange artifacts cause the situation to take a dire turn...

name: Underground Sheriff
description: It's time to make a law even where there is none. The underground world is going to be populated. But as long as danger and insecurity persist there, the world cannot do anything. You're going to manage on your own, because that's the only way you'll prove that you're a real sheriff who fights for his territory.

name: Hell's Mouth
description: Stoner Fueled Singleplayer RPG set in a city inspired by Helmond. Become the most OG smoker there is and build a weed empire in the society of Hell's Mouth. Fight enemies in the real-time combat system. Roam the open world while completing quests you run into.

name: HatMania
description: HatMania is a retro top down multitasking platformer with a twist. To succesfully guide two companions through a treacherous dungeon, you must split your attention and navigate both their fates at the same time.

name: Space Dudes vs Alien Dudes
description: Space Dudes vs Alien Dudes - Alien Dudes are attacking the base, It's up to the space dudes to stop them!

name: Automatic War
description: "Automatic War" is a cool auto battler. You are not in control of the battle process itself, but you can influence the outcome of the battle before the battle begins. Choose wisely and feel the excitement of fights!

name: Home Office Simulator
description: Home Office Simulator is a relaxing and cute simulator game about the experience of a girl called Ayame, working remotely. Part of the game is to keep Ayame free from distractions and keep her focused.

name: Cave Crawlers
description: Cave Crawlers is a 1-10 player rogue lite set deep underground in a system of randomly generated caves. Players use weapons, spells, and talents to defeat the unique bosses and enemies found in each biome.

name: Oylinder
description: A 3D platformer like you've never seen before, you must climb a mountain, by controlling a ball with six legs, a key for each leg, jump, roll and fall until you have mastered it. If you seek a challenge, this is it.

name: JB Hunter: Adventure
description: Our character - blogger and prankster. All what he doing is attract new subscribers to his blog. He delve on private beach, which only for girls, where he steal beach accessories and swimwear they have. But be careful, girls can punish your character if you are too brazen.

name: Neko Dating Sim
description: Neko Dating Sim is a non-linear life simulation visual novel where you date multiple catgirls at the same time! Each girl has their own unique personalities, likes and dislikes. Your goal is to build relationships with each of them and become closer than just friends.

name: Candice DeBebe's Tantalising Tricks
description: The third entry in the stunningly scandalous sorceress's story, in the form of a turn-based RPG.

name: Jetpack Guy
description: Can We Go to the Top? This TV-Headed Guy Want to fly High with His Jetpack! There are Many Annoying Obstacles that stand in Your Way. Be careful your flight! And Watch his Head! Fly to the Top with this Jetpack!

name: Alien Town Invasion
description: Sci fi survival based game.

name: Redaction
description: Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Redaction is a fast-paced, 4-person FPS squad-based PVE looter shooter set in a post-apocalyptic dystopian setting. Early Access coming in late 2022. Wishlist now to lock in a low low price on launch!

name: Synchronicity
description: 1v1 turn-based tactics, online or vs a practice-AI in a futuristic cyberpunk setting. Plan 3 steps in advance while your opponent does the same. Mind-game and outsmart your opponent with a variety of abilities, destructible and penetrable environments and a good strategy.

name: Turbo Cat Fight
description: Turbo Cat Fight is an oddball pixel-perfect fighting game. Both players get to choose their loadouts and they fight it out! Challenge your friend to an ultimate showdown of an earthshaking fist trade!

name: Summon Elemental
description: The ancient forest was invaded by evil creatures, Brave summoner, pray for the power of elements, prepare to meet fierce and brutal opponents! Mix different elements to create a unique element creation! Defeat the attacking monster, obtain rare props, and strengthen the power of Elemental!

name: Hentai Neko
description: Hentai neko is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Entangled Souls
description: Why did she choose death? In a nightmare of madness, she searches for abominable memories. This is a horror action adventure game that can be played with simple movement controls and a single button. There are no lines or sentences. You can play regardless of your location or language.

name: Stellabits
description: Stellabits is a puzzle game that aims to clear levels by controlling various gimmicks while operating four characters. The clear condition of the level is to collect all the stars in the field. There is no element of action, and pure procedural thinking is required.

name: Sex Adventures: Office Affairs
description: An erotic visual novel about the workplace sexual relationship between two women. Everything takes a turn when they are caught by their colleagues.

name: Lighten Up
description: Lighten Up is a bite-sized logic puzzle game. Exercise your brain as you drag and drop puzzle pieces to victory!

name: Omega Mouse
description: Omega Mouse is a tactical-action style game of cat and mouse. Know when to retreat and when to attack. Climb the leaderboard rankings by competing for the highest enemy kill counts.

name: Road Stones
description: Discover the true power of magical crystals in Road Stones! By any means necessary stop the hordes of undead monsters with their sole aim to destroy any living souls. Try to be the brave and bold hero that is desperately needed in this monster-infested kingdom.

name: Arcade vs Player
description: For a long time the arcade machines were won and forgotten in the corners of bars, but the time for the arcade machines revenge has arrived. Prepare your coins.

name: Perfect Inventory
description: Perfect Inventory is an organization puzzle game that brings you to a medieval age in the role of a methodical squire trying to make his best to fit all the items perfectly into the inventory.

name: Patagon
description: Patagon is a first person open world VR Steam Punk adventure shooter. It's fun and easy to play. The game takes place in an alternate steampunk reality where the British empire has never ended. Battle giant monsters and dinosaurs while you explore Sand Dollar island.

name: Vacoo: The Adventure in Garbage City
description: Single-player 2D platformer with metroidvania and puzzle elements.Discover this amazing new world has been drawn by our artists from scratch.Fend off the enemy, climb into the most secret places, learn the rules of this city and finally save your friend.

name: Chasing the Unseen
description: Climb massive creatures, explore otherworldly landscapes and find what you have been seeking.

name: Fortune the Fated
description: To unlock ancient spells needed to defend the galaxy, can you navigate fantasy quests, noir cases, heroic competitions, dystopian worlds & space heists?

name: Fastraq
description: Fastraq is a high-speed anti-gravity racing game. Drive on roller coaster like tracks, overtake your opponents and engage in combat. Experience tight turns, 360 degree loops and intense combat.

name: The Last of Them
description: Complete missions across different regions to stop the infection. ️ Promote your rank to unlock new weapons. Make radio calls for for air aid, supply packages, etc.

name: NecroTactics
description: An auto-battler roguelite with tower defense and horde survival elements. Draft and position your army, develop your graveyard, equip units with powerful items, cast spells, and place turrets to annihilate your opponent's army in seconds!

name: Ricochet Rodeo
description: Saddle up for Ricochet Rodeo, a 2D-platform, pvp brawl to see who's the fastest shooter in the pixel-rendered west. Assemble a posse of up to 8 cowboys to dance in chaotic deathmatches where bullets bounce and 1 hit kills.

name: Unrush
description: Help Chhama find his grandson.

name: B-17 Flying Fortress the Bloody 100th
description: Manage and take control of the 10-man crew of a B-17 Flying Fortress as they attempt to complete 25 harrowing missions inspired by the real-life battles of The Bloody 100th Bomber group.

name: Doors
description: Doors is a story based first person shooter game in which the protagonist awakes in a seemingly endless void and must persist through his delusions to discover the truth about his fate and understand why he is there.

name: Park Ranger: Lost in the Woods
description: Explore the map and search for clues relating to the missing person's report, but be careful. You're not alone, you are being followed. Looking at him only makes it worse, he is always watching. He is always coming.

name: Mainbody
description: A puzzle-based horror game where the player takes on the role of a building manager who manages a haunted building and its "patients". Through the player's different options will raise or lower the pollution value, thus triggering different endings.

name: Fading Light: Antiworld
description: The post-war world of nuclear explosion has trapped you in a dark circulated antiworld. Armed only with a faint flashlight and antimatter collector, you have to generate enough energy and hold on till the first sight of the morning light. Hurry, but be careful, it's rumored that you are not alone...

name: Rocket Inc
description: Help build mankind's last magnificent structure in this game where you carry out transport missions between planets in the solar system. Build your company and prepare to take off! Earn humankind's respect with more missions.

name: Darkness Reborn
description: Short and very dark Medival-Fantasy themed Single-Player RPG

name: Genzai: Serialization
description: Genzai:Serialization is a fantasy Japanese style Roguelike card game. You will play a role of one cute girl to explore the Sakura Mountain and use cards with yin-yang system to defeat different enemies. Many interesting creatures will also bring you a variety of possible plot journeys.

name: Longeyed Proj.
description: Prepare to be assigned to help investigate and identify anomalous creatures called the Longeyed.

name: Degen Royale
description: We welcome you to Degen Royale, a First-Person-Shooter taking place on the tropical Degen Islands. We bring the fun back into the gaming experience. Join us in whacky online rumbles with your friends and see if you can become the Degen Royale champion.

name: Kitari and Kimoshi
description: Kitari and Kimoshi is a story about two girls who meet for the very first time through unusual circumstances. Click through the manga pages, and make choices that affect the flow of the story.

name: Band Space
description: Band Space is a co-op VR rhythm game for one to four players.Standing on various stages with lighting show, playing drum set, keyboard, bass or guitar, your band will become rock star!

name: Mirages
description: Mirages is a 3D narrative and horror game with folk stories. One night, seven brides headed to the Captain Mansion but strayed into a place full of ghosts - Regret City. Horror haunts the small town. Due to destiny, actors, warlords, and offspring of the town are drawn in. They are closer to truth.

name: Must Flee
description: An unknown place, an unknown secret base and an unknown robot from another planet! What does he want? What are you looking for inside the base? Will it be destroyed or will it be able to flee? Play in third person with an alien robot who has infiltrated a secret military installation.

name: Saving Healer
description: Saving healer is a minimalistic puzzle game where you need to finish an ambush of enemies in just one turn.

name: Twilight of the Gods
description: Twilight of the Gods, a fantasy action roleplay game, relates the tale of August, a young orphan who was abandoned when he was five years old. After hearing the tragic news of his father's passing, August undergoes protracted training to put a stop to the evil forces around his village, who set out on an adventure to safeguard the place they were in when he was a young child. We assume control of our hero, who decides to follow the warrior's path in order to save his loved ones. He leaves the village that we have promised to defend and levels up by protecting it and its residents from evil spiders, robbers, and an enormous dragon

name: Super Mando
description: Platform game in pixel art 2D where you can run, jump, dodge obstacles and crush enemies, a challenging retro adventure

name: Mantra
description: Mantra is a multiplayer (1-5 player) and single-player psychological-horror game with high tension. Do whatever it takes to save your soul that has been possessed by an demonic spirit. If you don't, demon will imprison you in hell for eternity.

name: Realm of the Fallen
description: VR meets old school FPS meets Metroidvania. Blast, bludgeon, jump, and climb your way through an ancient temple that has been overrun by augmented undead minions. Beware of the Sentinel, a drone that relentlessly hunts intruders. Set in a world with a unique aesthetic and horror elements.

name: Deeper
description: Deeper is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. In Deeper you play as Jake and guide him through life making decisions which will surely impact the world around him and his relationships with each character.

name: Battle Gear
description: A zombie virus that began with a meteorite, the surviving humans fled to the sea by boat. To get the world back, And for the victory of the human race, Solve the problems, As a troubleshooter for the UN, that's your mission.

name: Arena Chaos
description: Arena Chaos is a 2D platform shooter where you have to fend off attacks.

name: Neon Blood
description: The dual Viridis, separated between the luxurious Bright City and the dangerous Blind City, where inequality reigns until you, Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world in this cyberpunk RPG adventure.

name: Pot Breaker
description: You are the Pot Breaker - smash all 1000 pots if you are up for a relaxing challenge. Build up you character to quicken your progress and aid in fighting off the multiple enemies and obstacles in your way.

name: Bosorka
description: Bosorka is an exciting action roguelike where a young witch saves the world from insidious and cruel demons. Combine runes, master a variety of brooms, and try all possible and impossible spells until you gain enough power to fight evil.

name: The Longest Road on Earth: World Tour Bundle
description:
This World Tour Bundle includes:
• The Longest Road on Earth
• The Longest Road on Earth bundle exclusive soundtrack
• 3 master tracks – perfect for remixes!
• A selection of chords and lyrics sheets
• A behind-the-scenes documentary about the development of The Longest Road on Earth and its soundtrack
• An art book chalked full of stunning pixel-art

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Protector Pack
description:
The Protector Pack gives the player bonus crafting materials, extra cosmetics for Amicia, and an exclusive crossbow skin.

This pack contains :
-The exclusive Red Damsel crossbow skin. Unlocked in the game when the crossbow is found.
-The 13 flowers Amicia could find in A Plague Tale: Innocence to wear in her hair. Unlocked at the beginning of the adventure.
-A pack of metal scraps and a tool to improve your gear early on. Unlocked in the game when accessing a workbench for the first time.

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
description:
A port based on Castlevania: Symphony of the Night's expanded re-release for Castlevania: The Dracula X Chronicles.

Jump, dash and slash your way through Dracula’s vast castle as Alucard while encountering a unique array of enemies and characters along the way. Rediscover the world of Castlevania through one of its most iconic and groundbreaking games.

Unique to the mobile port is a new Continue function, allowing you to resume progress right in the room where you died. The pause-menu screen has also been completely redesigned for a modern aesthetic as well as touch-screen optimization and high-resolution artworks/backgrounds. Choose between using an external controller, or the default touchscreen controls which provide convenient on-screen button-shortcuts for spells and transformations. Unlock achievements with hard-fought battle milestones.

name: ThanksKilling Day
description:
The boy, who was about to celebrate Thanksgiving Day with his family, finds himself stuck in a house with a dangerous stranger who seems to be responsible for his parent's disappearance.

A bleak, cold, and dark night was certainly the perfect setting for the sinister events, that you will be forced to witness for yourself!

Run, Hide, Solve Survive!

Featuring an incredible voice cast including Doug Cockle (Geralt from the Witcher series), Sandy Johnson (1978's Halloween), Christopher Murray (twin peaks, parks and rec), CinnamonToastKen (Professional Youtuber) & many more!

name: The Siren's Song
description: A brief kinetic novel for the O2A2 2022 game jam, a marine biologist falls down a trench and meets a siren, upon which they develop a rich infatuation.

name: Underworld Island
description: Underworld Island is a Full Motion Video (FMV) horror thriller interactive story game. Discover the truth about the Samsara on the Underworld Island. You must make the right choice every step of the way to save your daughterh. The game is developped and published by Mountain & Sea Studio.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire II
description: Battle for galactic dominance in this real-time 4X strategy game with unrivaled scale! You’ll explore, expand, exploit, and exterminate through military force, diplomacy, trade, culture, influence, and other underhanded tactics.

name: Hive Spy Remi: Mind Control Madness
description:
A Saturn-like style game for the 2022 32-bit Game Jam!

Remi returns! While packing up for a vacation, a mad scientist invaded the hive with mind-controlled Hornets and is trying to get to the Queen! Help Remi prevent the kidnapping of the Queen and save the hive. Sneak past enemies and knock them out to progress.

name: Shanubis
description: You find yourself trapped alone in a pyramid, being hunted by an Egyptian God. Break containers to find what you need to survive and escape but stay quiet, Shanubis doesn't like trespassers. Just ask the rest of the research team...

name: Interior Worlds
description: Interior Worlds is an ambient first-person exploration game where you take pictures of liminal spaces.

name: Goreagulation
description: Deposited into a labyrinth of flesh and metal, you see things others won't believe, experience horrors beyond ordinary comprehension, and witness impossibilities that drive lesser men mad. Only one directive remains evident in your mind - Ascend the Spire. Destroy the Eye.

name: Heretic's Fork
description: Roguelike Deckbuilder where you use your cards to construct a hellish tower capable of keeping the endless hordes of the underworld from escaping their torment.

name: Reeve
description: The adventure begins for Reeve, who escaped from hell and reached the ancient world. But Reeve's energy and abilities are insufficient. That's why he needs to get stronger and gain talent. He needs to get stronger by absorbing magic scrolls and the abilities of enemies.

name: One Piece Unlimited World Red: Chopper Edition
description:
One Piece: Unlimited World Red is an Action/Adventure video game based on the famous One Piece manga and anime.

This is the thirty-sixth video game based on the series, and the fifth title in the Unlimited sub-series. It was released for the Nintendo 3DS in Japan on November 21, 2013 and released for additional platforms and in more regions the following year.

name: Apex Legends: Eclipse
description: The new map Broken Moon has a fierce defender: meet Catalyst and see the brutal beauty of Cleo in Apex Legends:

name: Where did I put it?
description: A tiny game about trying to find something.

name: Level Zero: Extraction
description:
Level Zero: Extraction is a multiplayer extraction horror - a unique take on survival experience that blends the heart-pounding tension of asymmetric horrors with the high-stakes showdowns of extraction shooters.

Embark on a dangerous scavenging expedition where 3 teams of up to 3 mercenaries compete for loot and dare to come back. Or take on the role of two deadly alien monsters and hunt for human prey.

name: Bicho
description: Sin descripción

name: World of Warships: Starter Pack - Ishizuchi
description: Have you just started out on your way in World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.

name: Home
description: Sin descripción

name: I Fought the Lawn
description: Cut and mow blade after blade, build up a fleet of machines, add upgrades for challenging lawns. Procedurally generated yards offer new challenges and rewards. Call on friends to help, or save the job for yourself!

name: Mojo Melee
description: Mojo Melee is a strategic auto chess battler game where strategy and tactics reign supreme. Assemble unique teams of Mojos, Champions, and SpellStones, and battle it out in engaging PvP matches.

name: Fairyside
description: A dark fantasy roguelike shoot-em-up with lots of bullet hell featuring cute pixel art, visual novel interludes, and story-driven gameplay. Join Shirley in her journey to learn magic and survive Redwood Academy!

name: Noroware Cycle
description: Mayuhara City, Tokyo. The wounds of the mass suicide event of Mayuhara Academy from eight years ago have finally begun to heal. The rumors of the “Mayuhara Curse” are still whispered amongst the students.

name: Aeons Past
description: Aeons Past is a 3D Turn-Based RPG with heavy emphasis on rewarding exploration, getting immersed in a story-rich narrative, and deep characterization.

name: Aeon Wars: Maschinen Crisis
description: Aeon Wars: Maschinen Crisis is a turn-based tactical multiplayer wargame featuring collectible miniatures set in an original sci-fi universe where you battle with your friends on epic diorama-style terrains. Collect models and assemble them into armies. Play with friends in PvP or in PvE coop scenarios. Outside of play, enjoy your Collector Space and customize your models: swap parts and gear or paint new color schemes.

name: Agelast
description: Agelast is a horror game set in Korea, played from the perspective of a student in a difficult situation. Find a way out and interact as you progress through the story. There are no puzzles.

name: Alice's Burger Shop
description: It is a simulation game that manages a burger shop. Take orders and serve food without making customers wait. Research the cuisine and devise decorations to enhance the appeal of the restaurant. Pay attention to the feelings of the staff, manage the shop efficiently, and aim for a famous shop.

name: A Meeting of Dreams
description: A story rich RPG, where your decisions matter and can lead to disaster or salvation. Explore across two worlds, solving puzzles and finding secrets. Fight in tactical turn based combat, with no random encounters.

name: Angelic Wishes
description: Angelic Wishes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Angels of Amsterdam
description: Angels of Amsterdam; a truthful recreation of a 17th century Amsterdam-café, where you share key episodes in the lives of Maritgen Jans, Juliana, Elsje Christiaens and Pussy Sweet: four fierce angels who were not getting their fair share of the Golden Age’s gold and took destiny in their own hands.

name: Annie and the AI
description: Step into the role of Esme, an AI built by Annie but built for what purpose? Evolve and learn by solving visual puzzles accompanied by beautiful hand-drawn artwork. Learn all about Annie's life, befriend her, and grow together.

name: Antimatter Dimensions
description: Earn antimatter through dimensions! Gain Infinite antimatter to collapse the universe!

name: Antrabhara
description: In a world where humans and monsters coexist, three boys and girls with different identities meet in an abandoned old house. During the adventure together, they collect props, solve puzzles, escape from indescribable creatures, uncover the bloody history behind the ancient house family, and finally discover the secret of the "bardo".

name: Ariel's Daily Grind
description: After falling miserably into debt, Ariel summons her resolve and starts working jobs to grind her way out of financial ruin.

name: Astrid: Reverie
description: In the near future, the 'Mindscape' allows you to enter the depths of your mind and relive your memories. Haunted by strange hallucinations, Astrid feels her life breaking down around her. Help Astrid face her fears in this horror-mystery adventure that combines 3D gameplay with FMV elements.

name: A Week
description: A Week is a side scrolling adventure game. All you need to do is take care of your dog.

name: Avani
description: Join Avani in this action-adventure game where you will explore this corrupted land, fight the evil that hides within and cleanse it from the spirit before it destroys the world.

name: Barrel Full of Monkeys
description: Run from monkeys, hold onto ammo, and search for an exit! Can you escape the maze?

name: Boot Camp Endless Runner
description: Free to play, Endless Runner. Dodge Obstacles and collect Ammo

name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Prodigies
description: Do you think you have nothing to learn from a child? And what about the world's greatest chess prodigies of all time? Let BOT.vinnik - the Soviet digital trainer - show you how.

name: Broken In Time
description: Broken In Time is an action/adventure Turn based RPG. You (Titus) will explore different dimensions, solve puzzles, fight demons and monsters and ally with the other hero's around the multiverse!

name: Building our Futature
description: Building our Futature is a futa NTR game where the player can choose what content they would like to see in the next in-game week. This way you can decide what type of scenes you'd like to avoid or what content to focus on.

name: Bunni Gunni Classic
description: They took your kids... Take their lives! Bunni Gunni Classic is a much needed polishing for the game jam game made in 4 days!

name: CampNight
description: Take care of your fire or you freeze to death!

name: Cannon Royale
description: Cannon Royale is a card-based up to 4-player free-for-all 'Multiply or Release' game. Spin the wheel to get cards with unique abilities such as getting extra shots, multipliers, shields and more. Play solo to unlock new leagues and new gear to customize your equipment with or play with your friends!

name: Chaqs
description: Chaqs is an instructive CTF (Capture The Flag) game that performs the basic functions of an operating system. While it meets your expectations from an operating system to a certain extent with the applications it contains, Chaqs progresses in the direction of more challenges in terms of gameplay.

name: Chilljong
description: Chilljong is an endless adventure for lovers of puzzles and unhurried gameplay without limits! An unusual hybrid of genres in the style of mahjong connect will delight fans of the genre.

name: Chimeral Fantasy
description: Explore a fantasy world, assemble a party of quirky characters you meet along the way, and fight monsters in turn based tactical combat! Set between the "real" world and the fantastical dreams of a young girl, you must help save the king in her dreamland- and maybe help to save her ill father, too.

name: Chinese Characters
description: "Chinese characters" is an elimination and puzzle game, put the same three words into the bottom slot to eliminate, eliminate all the words to pass the level, the game should always pay attention to the lower level of the text.

name: Chompy Chomp Chomp Party
description: Invite your friends and family to join you for a Chompy Chomp Chomp Party. A chaotic and fun local multiplayer game for up to 8 players that will bring joy and laughter to the room.

name: Chroma Circuit
description: The far-future painter-racer! A single/multiplayer party racing game that has you painting boosting pads on the racetrack as you color the world of Synthara, 1,000 years into a world that isn't an apocalypse for once.

name: Chyss
description: Chyss is a turnbased, tactical 1vs1 game inspired from chess. You can move, attack, and consume your mana to summon new units, cast spells and use items when it's your turn. Your characters both have a move type and range and an attack type and range. Overcome your opponent's team!

name: Classical Music Minesweeper
description: A new and innovative minesweeper that allows you to casually enjoy feeling like you have better ears. The number of mines in a traditional minesweeper is represented by a number. In this game, the number of mines is represented by the sound of a piano.

name: Clockwork Survivors
description: Don't hold forward, don't press fire, but focus on the vertical in this autorunning reverse bullet hell roguelike. Master the level layout by lapping the same short section several times while you gather steam for your hot air balloon companion. Make the balloon & yourself happy.

name: Clean Energy Creatures
description: Clean Energy Creatures is an action packed 2d action-adventure video game about cute, disc-golf loving, alien creatures summoned to earth to install solar panels, battle the Coal Baron and survive the impacts of climate disasters along the way.

name: Corgi Cove
description: Follow the adventure of Gizmo, a super smart puzzle-solving corgi!

name: Cosmic Coliseum
description: Fight for your freedom as you battle through wave after wave of alien adversaries. Destroy enemy fighters and collect XP to raise your level and become more powerful. Combine your skills and abilities with a huge range of power-ups to become the ultimate champion.

name: Couroland
description: Idle RPG game

name: CRAP
description: A Card Multiplay Auto Battler. Choose your Hero. Select a Supporter and start searching for an enemy. Choose wisely between Artefacts, Statcards and Weapons to win against your oponent. Win the Best of 3 and get Rankpoints ;)

name: Driverio 2
description: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Turret Lab
description: Will you be able to escape from this professor's lab? This professor's lab isn't as easy as it looks. An advanced lab with turrets and lots of traps. You get stronger with each level you pass and you need to escape from this lab!

name: Survive & Craft
description: You survive in a terrible plane crash and now you are out of civilization. Around the endless ocean, exhausting sun and hungry sharks. There is only one thing left for you - to survive at any cost.

name: Pixel Paint
description: Pixel Paint is anything but a classic coloring book. The point of the game is for you to put your mind at ease, follow the numbers and fill every last pixel with a corresponding color. Sink into the gameplay loop of Pixel Paint.

name: Zoonomaly
description: A zoo has been taken over by monsters and you have been tasked with entering this zoo, finding the cause of the monster infestation, and putting a stop to it. To accomplish this task, you must collect key shards that have been scattered throughout the zoo. To find the key shards, you must solve puzzles within the animal enclosures. Once all the shards are collected, you can assemble the master key to unlock the source of the monster anomalies.

name: Zombie Defence TD
description: Zombie Defence TD is a tower defence shooter where humans fight off waves of invading zombies on a planet ravaged by an apocalyptic holocaust. You'll control different heroes with different skills to defeat the waves of invading zombies.

name: Mice Tea
description:
Margaret de Campos, a store clerk frustrated with her current position in life, finds a tea that turns her into an anthropomorphic mouse. Things only seem to get weirder and more transformative as they go on.

Margaret de Campos is a young clerk at a local bookstore who needs some change in her life. Her job feels like a dead end, her love life is in a rut, and she's not happy with how she looks. All of that is upended when she stumbles upon a box of magical tea with the tendency to transform people into anthropomorphic animals. Depending on your choices, the lives of Margaret, her friends, and her coworkers are irrevocably changed as the story leads to several wildly different paths. Help Margaret find love and a deeper understanding of herself and her... proclivities by playing Mice Tea!

name: Mussoumano: Saving Latifas
description: Mussoumano: Saving Latifas is an endless runner where the rapper and YouTuber Mussoumano must save his fans who have been kidnapped by haters and trolls while he was playing video games.

name: Mussoumano 3D Run
description: Mussoumano 3D Run is an endless runner in which the rapper and youtuber Mussoumano is pursued by crazy fanatics looking after autographs and selfies with him. Shocked by them and fearing to be run over, Mussoumano runs to save his own life.

name: MiniPoly.io
description: MiniPoly.io is a movement-based first person shooter game with a lot of weapons, skins and customisation

name: The Surge 2: Public Enemy Weapon Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Public Enemy Weapon Pack and get access to 13 brand new weapons. From pillaged CREO equipment to nanite-infected staves and recycled rotor blades, find the enemies that equip them, cut them off and equip them for yourself in your fight for Jericho City!

name: The Surge 2: Jericho's Legacy Gear Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Jericho's Legacy Gear Pack and get access to 3 new armor sets. Fight your way out of the city with the brutally stylish beast Tank Buster, the sleek Kyoko Hacker Suit and Jericho's official Firetails Mascot! Find the enemies wearing them, cut them off and equip them for yourself!

name: Evil West: Signature Edition
description:
Evil West – Signature Edition includes:
- An exclusive artwork by artist Gabz as a numbered laminated wooden frame (artwork printed on wood)
- A certificate of authenticity hand-signed by the artist
- A physical copy of the game for the platform of your choice using Gabz’s artwork as an exclusive box art
- Wild Wild East Skin Pack DLC

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle
description: Pick a side or die alone, there’s no in between. Get the Gang Wars Cosmetics Bundle to receive all three Gang Wars skin set DLCs and embody an Escher, Goliath, or Nautican with exclusive skins for your outfit, knife, mastiff and chew toy.

name: Necromunda: Hired Gun - Hellhound Pack
description: The Hellhound pack for Necromunda: Hired Gun comes with unique cosmetics for your knife, outfit, and mastiff. Put the fear into your prey before you croak & with your rusty knife and midnight hound. Tonight, Death stalks the hive.

name: Pendulo Adventure Pack
description: Pendulo Adventure pack includes 5 beautifully produced adventure games, with rich scenarios, ever-present humour and captivating puzzles.

name: Menagerie II: Presentable Liberty
description: You have been imprisoned without being told why. All you can hear day in day out is the faint ticking of a clock in your cell. That is, until the first of 5 fateful days begins.

name: Orchestra: The Brass Fate
description: Sin descripción

name: Cult of the Lamb: Cultist Pack
description: Be the envy of every cult with this exclusive Cultist Pack that includes a seven-piece decoration pack for your charming commune, as well as five exclusive Follower forms.

name: Two Point Hospital: Exhibition Items Pack
description: What is Art? Sure, it’s paintings and sculptures and things like that. But really… what is Art? Well, rather than dip into that profound can of worms, we’ve summarised our answer with a lovely collection of items.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Escalation Pack
description: New unit types for all factions enter the fray with the Escalation Pack. Each of the new units brings something new to their faction, from superior firepower to new exceptional abilities.
